item.title: Barbara Lee wins Oakland mayor’s race, taking over a city in crisis
item.description: The victory for liberals comes after moderate candidates and causes had prevailed in previous California races, even in other deep-blue districts.

item.title: It’s earmark season, and even archconservatives in Congress want in
item.description: Republicans had blocked $16 billion of spending on pet projects in the current fiscal year, but they are ready to seek them out again.

item.title: Three ex-presidents denounce the current one in a two-week stretch
item.description: While presidents have been at odds before, there is often a sort of camaraderie among the small club of individuals who have served in the highest off...

item.title: As firms bend to Trump, some workers say no
item.description: The president is forcing tough choices on organizations throughout the country — and their employees.

item.title: Travel to the U.S. from almost everywhere is falling under Trump
